thread.title: Blake Griffin decimates shot clock with pregame dunk
thread.title_full: Blake Griffin decimates shot clock with pregame dunk

author: Jake Whitacre
title: Blake Griffin decimates shot clock with pregame dunk
text:
Blake Griffin decimates shot clock with pregame dunk SB Nation 1 day ago Jake Whitacre © Provided by SB Nation
Have you every been so excited to play basketball that you've broken a shot clock? If so, you know how Blake Griffin feels right now.
AdChoices #clippers #blakegriffing breaks shot clock #NBAPreseason @cjzero pic.twitter.com/nhb8uyFeqv
— David (@zdlr187) October 4, 2015
We get they're excited to get back to playing basketball, but breaking a shot clock means you have to wait longer before you actually get to play. You have to think this out, Blake Griffin.
A photo posted by Rico Uno (@ricouno) on Oct 4, 2015 at 4:11pm PDT
Go to MSN Home
